channel.title: Instruction Manual Read Change
channel.description:
I'm using Acrylicx source, and I'm trying to make the Instruction Manual open up when you click read and show my commands that I have added. I can type the commands in myself, I just want to know where and what to add to make the read work on the Instruction manual and show what I type. Btw, the Instruction Manual right now works fine, but doesn't show or do anything when you right click > Read.
Somebody please help me...

item.title: Instruction Manual Read Change
item.dc:creator: @tdmister45 tdmister45
item.description:

I’m using Acrylicx source, and I’m trying to make the Instruction Manual open up when you click read and show my commands that I have added.
